mapper.sql: id, name, fk_pro_sub_series_name, fk_pro_classify_sub_name, fk_shp_shop_id, type, state, sort, insert_time, update_time, insert_admin, update_admin, del, remark
mapper.select: select id, name, fk_pro_sub_series_name, fk_pro_classify_sub_name, fk_shp_shop_id, type, state, sort, insert_time, update_time, insert_admin, update_admin, del, remark from pro_series_model where name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fk_pro_classify_sub_name = #{classifySubName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fk_pro_sub_series_name = #{subSeriesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into pro_series_model
id,
name,
fk_pro_sub_series_name,
fk_pro_classify_sub_name,
fk_shp_shop_id,
type,
state,
sort,
insert_time,
update_time,
insert_admin,
update_admin,
del,
remark,
values
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fkProSubSeriesName,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fkProClassifySubName,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fkShpShopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update pro_series_model
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fk_pro_sub_series_name = #{fkProSubSeriesName,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fk_pro_classify_sub_name = #{fkProClassifySubName,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fk_shp_shop_id = #{fkShpShopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
insert_admin = #{insertAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_admin = #{updateAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del = #{del,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, fk_pro_sub_series_name, fk_pro_classify_sub_name, fk_shp_shop_id, type, state, sort, insert_time, update_time, insert_admin, update_admin, del, remark from pro_series_model where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select sm.id, sm.name as seriesModelName, sm.fk_pro_sub_series_name as subSeriesName, sm.fk_pro_classify_sub_name as classifySubName, sm.type from pro_series_model sm where sm.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and sm.del = '0'

select sm.id, sm.name as seriesModelName, sm.fk_pro_sub_series_name as subSeriesName, sm.fk_pro_classify_sub_name as classifySubName, sm.type from pro_series_model sm where sm.name = #{name} and sm.fk_shp_shop_id in(-9,#{shopId}) and sm.del = '0'
